thread.title: Kinexus DSR Series: Redefining Rheometer Capabilities for Asphalt Testing
thread.title_full: Kinexus DSR Series: Redefining Rheometer Capabilities for Asphalt Testing

title: Kinexus DSR Series: Redefining Rheometer Capabilities for Asphalt Testing
text:
Asphalt, or bitumen, is a petroleum product used in the road, roofing and construction industries. 
A mixture of aromatic hydrocarbons, this black viscoelastic material is considered to be a complex colloidal system. 
Asphalt is used as a binder with aggregates in road construction and as such determines performance and lifetime. 
Download to find out more. Available Downloads
